verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the U.S. and North Korea ( all times local ) : [ARGM-TMP: 10:20 a.m.] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: the time and place has been set for his historic meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the U.S. and North Korea ( all times local ) : 10:20 a.m. President Donald Trump says the time and place [V: has] been set for his historic meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the U.S. and North Korea ( all times local ) : 10:20 a.m. President Donald Trump says the time and place has [V: been] set for his historic meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — The Latest on the U.S. and North Korea ( all times local ) : 10:20 a.m. President Donald Trump says [ARG1: the time and place] has been [V: set] [ARGM-PRP: for his historic meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] .
